db:article.db:para: Qt for Education (Qt Edu) is a special licensing package for learning purposes. You can find more information about educational licensing here.
These instructions walk you through the installation of the different Qt Edu packages, as well as applying for the educational license.

db:listitem.db:para: Qt Edu for Designers - for those interested in creating user interfaces and functional user experiences
Qt Edu for Developers - for those interested in developing Qt applications

db:article.db:para: Qt Edu for Designers package contains Qt Design Studio Enterprise, allowing you to import your designs from design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD, and develop them further into functioning user interfaces on your target devices.

Qt Edu for Developers gives you access to developing with Qtâ€™s full C++ and QML frameworks, as well as its Python bindings. Developing on embedded systems is possible with Raspberry Pi as the target platform. This package also includes Qt Design Studio for designing user interfaces.
